rows.label: qst702201_msg0001
rows.name: Ah! Adel-sama!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0002
rows.name:
Hello, Vez.
All's well, I trust?

rows.label: qst702201_msg0003
rows.name: I have a minor point to report!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0004
rows.name:
Here it comes...
I have dropped the vault key!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0005
rows.name: What?!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0006
rows.name: Oh boy... That is a predicament.

rows.label: qst702201_msg0007
rows.name:
Just a "predicament"...?
It's a vault! Surely it's got things that
one might want to access sometime?

rows.label: qst702201_msg0008
rows.name:
Yes, Ma'am! It is a storage location for
all the Olgo family owns, from ancient
treasures through to tableware, Ma'am!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0009
rows.name: Wait, everything they own is in there?!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0010
rows.name: Adel-sama, this sounds bad!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0011
rows.name:
We have to find it! The key, I mean!
Straight away!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0012
rows.name:
How kind of you!
Are you really that worried about
my possessions?

rows.label: qst702201_msg0013
rows.name:
I've been poor before, so I know
what it feels like to have nothing!
And it feels bad!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0014
rows.name:
And considering the vault contains
priceless artifacts, it would be terrible
if some villain were to find the key first.

rows.label: qst702201_msg0015
rows.name:
Ah, about that!
No worries on that count, Ma'am!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0016
rows.name:
I dropped it in a Grafton Feris den
somewhere out on Wrackham Moor!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0017
rows.name:
So, no need to worry about anyone
picking it up! I may be incompetent,
but I'm not that incompetent!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0018
rows.name:
No, I think the dropping part proves the
incompetence. The rest is just icing...
And why were you even there?

rows.label: qst702201_msg0019
rows.name:
You can pick medicinal herbs there!
They help my gran, so I got all
caught up in picking them and...

rows.label: qst702201_msg0020
rows.name: ...And out came the Feris?

rows.label: qst702201_msg0021
rows.name: Exactly, Ma'am!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0022
rows.name: What is the point of you, really...?

rows.label: qst702201_msg0023
rows.name:
I-I mean, it's an important thing,
the key, so I always carry it with me
wherever I go, Ma'am!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0024
rows.name:
Stop torturing the help, Hikari.
We'll get the key, Vez, don't worry.

rows.label: qst702201_msg0025
rows.name:
Thank you for your honesty.
I'm relieved you weren't hurt.

rows.label: qst702201_msg0026
rows.name: Adel-sama, you're too kind!

rows.label: qst702201_msg0027
rows.name:
You heard him, Adel.
Too kind for your own good...
